full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI DON DAM PA'I MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'JAM DPAL YE SHES SEMS DPA'I DON DAM PA'I MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SH'AKYA THUB PAS GSUNGS PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHRADDHA KAR WARMA DANG, KA MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA RIN CHEN BZANG POS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB BO,, ,,
translator_(орчуулагч): SHRADDHA KAR WARMA, KA MA LA GUPTA, RIN CHEN BZANG PO,
